title: Picturesque views - right outside your window! Visit today!
posting_body: ['The Park At East Ponce', 'Visit our community today!', '1900 Tree Mountain Pkwy Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'show contact info', 'Unit Rates:', 'Please call', 'Unit Type:', '2-BR 2.5-BA', 'Unit Size:', '1354 sq ft', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'We welcome your pets for a maximum of 2 pets per apartment home.', 'Pet fee is $300.', '$15 Monthly Pet Fee.', 'Weight limit is 50 lbs.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call our leasing office for more information.', 'What you’ll find in our community:', '➢ Community Events', '➢ Controlled Access', '➢ Gated Community', '➢ Online Leasing', '➢ On-Site Property Manager', '➢ Picnic Area', '➢ Planned Social Activities', '➢ Storage', '➢ WI-FI Availability', '➢ Workout Center', '➢ Fax/Copy Services', '➢ Green and Flowered Areas', '➢ Monthly Resident Events', '➢ On-Site Maintenance', '➢ Package Receiving', '➢ Resident Referral Bonuses', '➢ Resort Style Swimming Pool', '➢ Some Architectural Distinction', '➢ Trail, Bike, Hike, Jog', '➢', 'Well Maintained Grounds', 'Description:', "There's plenty of shopping, dining, outdoor activities and more near The Park at East Ponce.", "You'll love living in the Stone Mountain location!", "With a variety of floor plans to choose from, we're certain there's one that's just right for you.", 'Browse our one and two bedroom floor plans.', 'This unit comes with:', '➢ Carpet', '➢ Ceiling Fans', '➢ Cozy Fireplaces', '➢ Dining Room', '➢ Disposal', '➢ Extra Storage', '➢ Island Kitchens', '➢ Range w/Oven', '➢ Refrigerator', '➢ Sunrooms', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ Custom Cabinetry', '➢ Hardwood Flooring', '➢ Individual Climate Control', '➢ Newly Renovated Apartments', '➢ Roommate Floor Plans', '➢ Townhomes Available', '➢ Trash Compactor', '➢ Washer & Dryer Connections', '➢ Window Coverings', 'Call or visit our website to schedule a personal tour!', 'Office Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Facebook:', '<URL>', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Property Management:', 'Ventron Management', 'Admin Fee: $135 - Non-Refundable', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '67DFEC1A07C44FB']
